reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is comfortable, with stretchy fabric that accommodates various body types.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!!
items.body: I love this dress. True to color and the dress looks exactly like the image. It's a fitted dress true to size and it is very comfortable. Excellent quality and material. Very affordable. Perfect for a wedding, date or prom. Be mindful of your shoe choise as my shoes had large rhinestones that occasionally snagged the dress. I accessorized the dress with this beautiful belt also an Amazon find https://a.co/d/j86JIOu. Would recommend. 10 out of 10. Read more
items.author: Kiesha H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Love this dress! Fit my curves perfectly. Very elegant. Material is very good. Read more
items.author: Tinnarella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy - nice looking dress
items.body: The dress is stunning. Great craftsman's ship and the material is great! I am 5.2 and weigh 140lbs and the sizing is accurate. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress
items.body: Great material, soft and stretchy. It hugs all the right places. The slit isn’t too high, it’s just the right height. For reference, 5’5, 150lb, and the medium fit perfect. I got compliments all night long. Just buy the dress!! Read more
items.author: BB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic dress!!!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and the material is comfortably thick. This dress looks high end and is well made. I only gave 4 stars because I have a large bust and am short so it’s not the most flattering on me. I am returning it but wish I could wear it. This color red is perfection. Read more
items.author: Colleen O'Brien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The material is super nice!
items.body: Exquisite, want a dress for banquet and this was it. I am 5’5” 178lbs and I got a large and it fit me very well , I love this dress Read more
items.author: Rosie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Nice thick material, true to size, I'm 5'7" and the dress is long so the length is perfect with heels. Read more
items.author: Vernette

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars awesome dress
items.body: The dress is awesome fit perfect I love the material I will definitely recommend I will buy again & again Read more
items.author: Georgiana Ouida Morgan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split One Shoulder Split Evening Formal Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split One Shoulder Split Evening Formal Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, White, Royal Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
